analyzed: de bzhin du bcug ste dbang bskur na ngan song thams cad las rnam par grol te /
translated: one should enter in the same way, and confer empowerment. If one does so, one will be completely liberated from all lower rebirths,

original: bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dang / gong nas gong dus rnams su yang skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dang / gong nas gong dus rnams su yang skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and will be born in the higher realms of the gods and so forth.

original: dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will also accomplish all powers.

original: sangs rgyas su yang gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas su yang gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will certainly become a buddha.

original: snga ma bzhin du las thams cad kyang byed cing thams cad la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du las thams cad kyang byed cing thams cad la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: As before, one will perform all activities and will be unimpeded in all respects.

original: bya ba byas pas ni rims nad thams cad dang / gdon dang / dug la sogs pa las thar bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bya ba byas pas ni rims nad thams cad dang / gdon dang / dug la sogs pa las thar bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Having done what is to be done, one will be freed from all fevers, evil spirits, poisons, and so forth.

original: phyag na rdo rje'i h'um zhes bya bas las thams cad skyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje'i h'um zhes bya bas las thams cad skyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: With the syllable hūṃ of Vajrapāṇi, all activities will be accomplished.

original: brtag pa gzhan gyi cho ga thams cad kyang sgrub par 'gyur ro //🔽lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa ngan song gi rgyud kyi dbang du gyur pa rnams kyi shi ba'i ro 'am /
analyzed: brtag pa gzhan gyi cho ga thams cad kyang sgrub par 'gyur ro // lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa ngan song gi rgyud kyi dbang du gyur pa rnams kyi shi ba'i ro 'am /
translated: All the rites of other tantras will also be accomplished.

original: gzugs brnyan nam /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan nam /
translated: The corpses, images, or

original: ming la sogs pa bris te bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / dbang rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du ngan song thams cad las yongs su grol bar byed do //
analyzed: ming la sogs pa bris te bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / dbang rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du ngan song thams cad las yongs su grol bar byed do //
translated: Having written their names and so forth, one should recite [the mantra], perform the burnt offerings, and the empowerments, and in the same way as before, one will be completely liberated from all the lower realms.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes seng ge'i lta stangs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes seng ge'i lta stangs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te /
translated: Then, Lord Vajrapāṇi, with a lion's gaze, looked at the face of the Blessed One,

original: phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: and having prostrated, he said this:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: @374b phyag rgya dam pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bgyi'o //🔽thugs rjes bskul ba'i thugs mnga' ba'i //
analyzed: @374b phyag rgya dam pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bgyi'o // thugs rjes bskul ba'i thugs mnga' ba'i //
translated: I will explain the characteristics of the supreme mudrā.🔽May the blessings of all the victors

original: rgyal ba kun gyi byin gyis rlobs //🔽mnyam par gzhag pas dpral bar ni //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi byin gyis rlobs // mnyam par gzhag pas dpral bar ni //
translated: inspire the mind of the compassionate one.🔽In meditative equipoise, at the forehead,

original: phyag 'tshal ba yi thal mo sbyar //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal ba yi thal mo sbyar //
translated: one should join the palms in añjali.🔽This is explained as the mudrā of homage

original: sangs rgyas bde gshegs skyes rnams kyi //🔽phyag 'tshal ba yi phyag rgyar bshad //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bde gshegs skyes rnams kyi // phyag 'tshal ba yi phyag rgyar bshad //
translated: of the buddhas, the sugatas, and the bodhisattvas.

original: rnal 'byor rig pas mgrin phyogs su //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rig pas mgrin phyogs su //
translated: With the awareness of yoga, at the throat,

original: thal mo snyim par sbyar ba ni //
analyzed: thal mo snyim par sbyar ba ni //
translated: one should join the palms in a cupped gesture.

original: rtag tu padma'i rigs nyid kyi //
analyzed: rtag tu padma'i rigs nyid kyi //
translated: This is always the mudrā of the lotus family.

original: padma'i phyag rgya yin par bshad //
analyzed: padma'i phyag rgya yin par bshad //
translated: This is explained to be the lotus seal.

original: rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas kyang //
analyzed: rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas kyang //
translated: Joining the vajra palms together,

original: snying gar gung mo'i mtha' sbyar ba //
analyzed: snying gar gung mo'i mtha' sbyar ba //
translated: and at the heart the tips of the middle fingers are joined.

original: rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya 'di //
analyzed: rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya 'di //
translated: This is the seal of the vajra family,

original: dam tshig thams cad 'dzin byed pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig thams cad 'dzin byed pa'o //
translated: which holds all the commitments.

original: lag pa g-yon pa'i thal mo gan rkyal du pang du bzhag la //
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pa'i thal mo gan rkyal du pang du bzhag la //
translated: With the left hand lying flat in one’s lap,

original: de yi steng du g-yas pa bzhag ste /
analyzed: de yi steng du g-yas pa bzhag ste /
translated: and placing the right hand on top of it,

original: mthe bo'i ngos gnyis sprad la zhi ba'i lta bas blta ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: mthe bo'i ngos gnyis sprad la zhi ba'i lta bas blta ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ste /
translated: the two sides of the thumbs are joined, and one looks with a peaceful gaze. This is the absorption seal of the tathāgata family.

original: dam tshig yin par bshad do //
analyzed: dam tshig yin par bshad do //
translated: This is explained to be the commitment.

original: de nyid las bzlog ste ltag 'og bsnol la mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig lu gu rgyud kyi tshul du bsnol te snying gar gzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de nyid las bzlog ste ltag 'og bsnol la mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig lu gu rgyud kyi tshul du bsnol te snying gar gzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: Reversing that, the upper and lower [hands] are crossed, and the thumbs and pinkies are crossed in the manner of a chain, and placed at the heart. This is the commitment seal of the vajra family.

original: thal mo rdzogs par sbyar ba las mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis bsnyams la lhag ma rnams brkyang ba 'di ni padma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: thal mo rdzogs par sbyar ba las mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis bsnyams la lhag ma rnams brkyang ba 'di ni padma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The pledge seal of the lotus family is formed by placing the two thumbs and little fingers together and extending the remaining fingers.

original: rdo rje bsdam pa bsdams pa las /🔽gung mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar bsnyams la /
analyzed: rdo rje bsdam pa bsdams pa las / gung mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar bsnyams la /
translated: The seal of Vajrapāṇi is formed by binding the adamantine bond🔽and pressing the two middle fingers together like a vajra,

original: @375a *// mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ba 'di ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o //🔽de nyid las mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis de bzhin du byas la /
analyzed: @375a *// mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ba 'di ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o // de nyid las mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis de bzhin du byas la /
translated: with the thumbs and little fingers extended.

original: mdzub mo gnyis dang / srin lag padmo 'dra bar bkug pa ni ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po'i thams cad sbyong ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis dang / srin lag padmo 'dra bar bkug pa ni ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po'i thams cad sbyong ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The seal of all-purifying purification of all evil destinies is formed by making the thumbs and little fingers touch in the same way,🔽and then bending the two index and ring fingers like a lotus.

original: de nyid las mdzub mo dang / srin lag gnyis rin po che 'dra bar byas pa ni dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de nyid las mdzub mo dang / srin lag gnyis rin po che 'dra bar byas pa ni dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The seal of consecration is formed by making the two index and ring fingers into a jewel in the same way.

original: mthe'u chung dang mthe bo so sor bsdams la /
analyzed: mthe'u chung dang mthe bo so sor bsdams la /
translated: The two little fingers and thumbs are crossed.

original: lhag ma rnams brkyang ba ni sdig pa thams cad sreg pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams brkyang ba ni sdig pa thams cad sreg pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The remaining fingers extended is the mudrā of burning all evil.

original: lag pa g-yon pas de bzhin du bsgyur zhing bya ba ni lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pas de bzhin du bsgyur zhing bya ba ni lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: Doing the same with the left hand is the mudrā of all gods.

original: snyim pa bzed la gyen du 'thor ba ni bdug pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: snyim pa bzed la gyen du 'thor ba ni bdug pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The cupped palms facing upward is the mudrā of incense.

original: de las 'og nas gyen du 'thor ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de las 'og nas gyen du 'thor ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: From that, throwing [the incense] upward is the mudrā of flowers.

original: de nyid las mthe bo gnyis gyen du bsnyams la mdun du 'dzin pa ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de nyid las mthe bo gnyis gyen du bsnyams la mdun du 'dzin pa ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: From that, the two thumbs are extended upward and held in front is the mudrā of lamps.

original: de nyid las dung 'dra bar byas pa ni dri'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de nyid las dung 'dra bar byas pa ni dri'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: From that, making [the hands] like a conch is the mudrā of perfume.

original: de nyid las rab tu brkyang ste 'dzin pa ni gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de nyid las rab tu brkyang ste 'dzin pa ni gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: From that, holding [the hands] fully extended is the mudrā of sacrificial cake.

original: de nyid las gung mo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni aa rga'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de nyid las gung mo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni aa rga'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: From that, the two middle fingers are inserted inside is the mudrā of argha.

original: rdo rje bcing ba las gung mo gnyis bsnyams te /
analyzed: rdo rje bcing ba las gung mo gnyis bsnyams te /
translated: From the vajra bond, the two middle fingers are joined,

original: tshigs dang po bcag la sor mo thams cad brkyang ba ni rnam par 'thor ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: tshigs dang po bcag la sor mo thams cad brkyang ba ni rnam par 'thor ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: the first joint is bent, and all the fingers are extended is the mudrā of scattering.

original: de nyid las mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis bkrug pa ni rnam par @375b 'joms pa'i rgya'o //
analyzed: de nyid las mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis bkrug pa ni rnam par @375b 'joms pa'i rgya'o //
translated: From that mudra, the index finger and the pinky are crossed, which is the mudra of Aparajita.

original: de nyid las 'od zer 'bar ba 'dra ba ni gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de nyid las 'od zer 'bar ba 'dra ba ni gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: From that mudra, the two hands are like blazing light rays, which is the mudra of Tejorasi.

original: de nyid las spyi bor bskor ba ni gdugs dkar po'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de nyid las spyi bor bskor ba ni gdugs dkar po'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: From that mudra, [the hands] are rotated above the head, which is the mudra of Sitapattra.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las mdzub mo gnyis dang / mthe'u chung gnyis bsnol te /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las mdzub mo gnyis dang / mthe'u chung gnyis bsnol te /
translated: From the two vajra fists, the two index fingers and the two pinky fingers are crossed,

original: mdung la gyen du bskor ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mdung la gyen du bskor ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: and [the hands] are rotated upward like a spear, which is the mudra of Cakravartin.

original: rdo rje bsngams pa las gung mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la mdzub mo gnyis rin po che lta bur byas te /
analyzed: rdo rje bsngams pa las gung mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la mdzub mo gnyis rin po che lta bur byas te /
translated: From the vajra bond, the two middle fingers are made into a vajra, and the two index fingers are made into a jewel.

original: lhag ma rnams 'od zer 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams 'od zer 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The remaining fingers are made like light rays, which is the mudra of Jayoṣṇīṣa.

original: de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la /
analyzed: de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la /
translated: Likewise, the two index fingers are made into a vajra,

original: sor mo lhag ma rnams bsngams nas rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i 'o //
analyzed: sor mo lhag ma rnams bsngams nas rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i 'o //
translated: and the remaining fingers are bound and made like a vajra, which is the mudra of Vijaya.

original: g-yas pa mchog sbyin du byas la g-yon pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yin no //🔽rdo rje bsngams pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa mchog sbyin du byas la g-yon pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yin no // rdo rje bsngams pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The right hand is in the boon-granting gesture, and the left in the gesture of granting fearlessness.🔽The vajra-bond is formed with the two index fingers extended and resembling a vajra.

original: de nyid las mdzub mo g-yas pa bkug pa ni lcags kyu'i 'o //
analyzed: de nyid las mdzub mo g-yas pa bkug pa ni lcags kyu'i 'o //
translated: The right index finger is bent in the same gesture, forming the hook.

original: de nyid las me tog 'dra bar byas pa ni mda'i 'o //
analyzed: de nyid las me tog 'dra bar byas pa ni mda'i 'o //
translated: The same gesture is made to resemble a flower, forming the arrow.

original: de nyid las slar bkug ste /
analyzed: de nyid las slar bkug ste /
translated: The same gesture is bent back,

original: mthe bo gnyis rtse mo sprad pa ni blo gros legs pa'i 'o //
analyzed: mthe bo gnyis rtse mo sprad pa ni blo gros legs pa'i 'o //
translated: with the tips of the two thumbs touching, forming the excellent mind.

original: de nyid las tshigs bar ma bcag pa ni rin po che'i 'o //
analyzed: de nyid las tshigs bar ma bcag pa ni rin po che'i 'o //
translated: The same gesture is made with the middle joints separated, forming the jewel.

original: de nyid las sor mo rnams 'od zer 'dra bar 'gyed pa ni gzi brjid kyi'o //
analyzed: de nyid las sor mo rnams 'od zer 'dra bar 'gyed pa ni gzi brjid kyi'o //
translated: The same gesture is made with the fingers radiating like light rays, forming the splendor.

original: de nyid las spyi bo bzhag pa dpal gyi'o //
analyzed: de nyid las spyi bo bzhag pa dpal gyi'o //
translated: The same gesture is placed on the crown of the head, forming the glory.

original: de nyid las mdun du bzhag pa ni bzhad pa'i @376a *//
analyzed: de nyid las mdun du bzhag pa ni bzhad pa'i @376a *//
translated: The same gesture is placed in front, forming the smile.

original: 'o // de nyid las padma 'dra bar byas pa ni padma'i 'o //
analyzed: 'o // de nyid las padma 'dra bar byas pa ni padma'i 'o //
translated: The same gesture is made to resemble a lotus, forming the lotus.

original: de bzhin nyid las rtse mo gnyis bkug pa ni ral gri'o 'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid las rtse mo gnyis bkug pa ni ral gri'o 'o //
translated: From suchness, the two tips are bent down, which is the sword.

original: de nyid las gdub bu 'dra bar byas pa ni 'khor lo'i 'o //🔽de nyid las padma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar byas pa ni lce'i 'o //
analyzed: de nyid las gdub bu 'dra bar byas pa ni 'khor lo'i 'o // de nyid las padma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar byas pa ni lce'i 'o //
translated: From that very [mudra], making it like a bracelet is the wheel.🔽From that very [mudra], making it like the petals of a lotus is the tongue.

original: de nyid las rtse mo yid tsam bskyed pa ni rgya gram mo //
analyzed: de nyid las rtse mo yid tsam bskyed pa ni rgya gram mo //
translated: From that very [mudra], slightly extending the tips is the crossed vajra.

original: de nyid las shin tu bskyed pa ni bsrung ba'i 'o //
analyzed: de nyid las shin tu bskyed pa ni bsrung ba'i 'o //
translated: From that very [mudra], fully extending [the fingers] is the protection [mudra].

original: de nyid las rtse mo gnyis slar bkug pa ni gnod sbyin gyi'o //
analyzed: de nyid las rtse mo gnyis slar bkug pa ni gnod sbyin gyi'o //
translated: From that very [mudra], bending the two tips back is the yaksha [mudra].

original: dam du bkug pa ni bsdams pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dam du bkug pa ni bsdams pa'i 'o //
translated: Tightly bending [the fingers] is the binding [mudra].

original: bsdams pa nyid mdun du bzhag pa ni bdug pa'i 'o //
analyzed: bsdams pa nyid mdun du bzhag pa ni bdug pa'i 'o //
translated: The very binding placed in front is the incense [mudra].

original: de nyid gyen du bstod pa ni phreng ba'i 'o //
analyzed: de nyid gyen du bstod pa ni phreng ba'i 'o //
translated: That very [mudra] raised up is the garland [mudra].

original: mdun du mthe bo gnyis bsdams te bskor ba ni mar me'i 'o //
analyzed: mdun du mthe bo gnyis bsdams te bskor ba ni mar me'i 'o //
translated: In front, the two thumbs bound and rotated is the lamp [mudra].

original: de nyid byug pa ltar byas pa ni dri'i 'o //🔽de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni lcags kyu'i 'o //
analyzed: de nyid byug pa ltar byas pa ni dri'i 'o // de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni lcags kyu'i 'o //
translated: That very [mudra] made like anointing is the scent [mudra].🔽From that very [mudra], bending the two index fingers is the iron hook [mudra].

original: de nyid las rtse mo gnyis sprad pa ni zhags pa'i 'o //
analyzed: de nyid las rtse mo gnyis sprad pa ni zhags pa'i 'o //
translated: From that very [mudra], the two tips joined is the noose [mudra].

original: de nyid las gcig la gcig mdud pa ni lcags sgrog gi'o //
analyzed: de nyid las gcig la gcig mdud pa ni lcags sgrog gi'o //
translated: The same text states that the noose is for binding one to another, and the iron chain is for shaking.

original: de nyid las bskyod pa ni mnyes pa'i 'o //
analyzed: de nyid las bskyod pa ni mnyes pa'i 'o //
translated: The same text states that the goad is for arousing.

original: sku gzugs kyi cho ga yang 'dir de bzhin du byas te /
analyzed: sku gzugs kyi cho ga yang 'dir de bzhin du byas te /
translated: The procedure for the image is also done in the same way.

original: cung zad du na bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs bri'o //
analyzed: cung zad du na bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs bri'o //
translated: However, one should draw the form of the Blessed One Trailokyavijaya.

original: yang na sku gzugs ni dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bris la me tog la sogs pas mchod de /
analyzed: yang na sku gzugs ni dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bris la me tog la sogs pas mchod de /
translated: Alternatively, one should draw the image in the form of a maṇḍala and worship it with flowers, and so forth.

original: de'i spyan sngar 'bum tsam zhig sngar bsnyen pa byas nas las thams cad bya'o //
analyzed: de'i spyan sngar 'bum tsam zhig sngar bsnyen pa byas nas las thams cad bya'o //
translated: Having performed the preliminary service of one hundred thousand [recitations] in front of it, one should perform all activities.

original: de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs rnams kyis @376b bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs rnams kyis @376b bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the hosts of gods, Brahmā and so forth, said this to the Blessed Vajrapāṇi:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: las kyi rnam par smin pa gang gis lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba de dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dbang du gyur /
analyzed: las kyi rnam par smin pa gang gis lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba de dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dbang du gyur /
translated: by the ripening of which karma did the god called Vimalagarbha become subject to the suffering of the hells and so forth?

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Then the Blessed One Vajrapāṇi, by the blessing of the Blessed Śākyamuni, said this:

original: lha'i dbang po nyon cig /
analyzed: lha'i dbang po nyon cig /

original: 'di ni sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yin te /
